title: Brand new apartment for sale at Dehiwala
details:
A cozy and comfortable apartment in an echo friendly environment. Consist a very spacious and luxury unit on 1100 sq. Located in a highly residential area on the first floor.

It has easy access to both Marine drive and Galle road. Conveniently located close to shops, schools, supermarkets, banks, restaurants, hospitals and transport. The floor plan consist of 2 spacious bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large living, dining and a pantry.

Safe and secure location with 24 hours security. Dedicated parking slot available.

For further inquiries please contact LINEA PROPERTY

REF ID : - LPAS127
